CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With film annealing treatments , the films form larger crystal grains and better film interconnectivity , which are favorable for the charge transport and lead to an increase of the mobility .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| film |
| film |

The two instances of "film" in the paragraph refer to the same material, so it can be considered as a single entity. Therefore, the table above presents the material name "film" only once.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| film |

The word "film" is the only material name mentioned in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With film annealing treatments , the films form larger crystal grains and better film interconnectivity , which are favorable for the charge transport and lead to an increase of the mobility .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystal grains |
| film interconnectivity |
| charge transport |
| mobility |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material property" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystal grains |
| film interconnectivity |

The entity "mobility" is not clearly a material property, as it refers to the movement of charges within the material, rather than a property of the material itself. Therefore, it has been excluded from the list.
